											os anos leves acabaram.
											A minha mãe foi diagnosticada

											Tinha-se espalhado para os ossos,

											Quando ela me contou,
fiquei devastada,
											endoideci completamente.
											Quando me recompus

											Isto não é sobre mim.
											Isto é sobre descobrir como ajudá-la.
											O meu pai é médico,
											e foi uma enorme vantagem
tê-lo a orientar.
											Ele fez um ótimo trabalho

											Mas eu também queria fazer

											por isso queria tentar tudo.

											Pesquisei medicinas alternativas,
											dietas, sumos, acupuntura.
											Finalmente, perguntei-lhe:
											"É isto que queres que faça?",
											e ela respondeu: "Não".
											Disse: "Vai devagar,

									,"

column12: On October 8, 2011,
the light years came to an end.
My mom was diagnosed with lung cancer.
It had spread to her bones,

column1: and it was in her brain.

column12: When she told me this, I fell to my knees.
I totally lost it.
And when I got myself together

column1: and I looked at her,

column12: I realized, this isn't about me.
This is about figuring out

column1: how to help her.

column12: My father is a doctor,
and so we had a great advantage

column1: having him in charge,

column12: and he did a beautiful job

column1: taking care of her.

column12: But I, too, wanted to do

column1: everything I could to help,

column12: so I wanted to try everything.
We all did.
I researched alternative medicines,
diets, juicing, acupuncture.
Finally, I asked her,
Is this what you want me to do?""
And she said, ""No.""
She said, ""Pace yourself.
